_rawTooltip.fullTooltip:
Innate: Zeri absorbs the energy of shields she damages, shielding herself equal to [[0]] dealt to the shield. Each instance of shield gained by Living Battery lasts for 3 seconds.
Innate: Whenever Zeri receives a shield, she gains [[1]] for 2 seconds.

[[0]] Zeri's attacks are treated as abilities and can be charrged by moving and casting this ability. Uncharged attacks consume a small amount of charge. deal [[1]] magic damage and execute enemies below 60 − 150 (based on level) (+ 18% AP) health a fully charged attack deals [[2]] and consumes all charge.

Active: This ablity is treated as an Attack. Zeri fires a burst of 7 rounds that deals [[3]] to the first enemy hit.

Zeri fires an electric pulse that deals [[0]] and [[1]] the first enemy hit by 30% for 2 seconds.

If the pulse hits terrain, it expands into a laser that applies the effects in an area and Critically Strikes champions and monsters.

Zeri dashes a short distance and vaults over any terrain she touches, greatly extending the dash range. For the next 5 seconds her shots of Burst Fire pierce dealing 80% damage to enemies after the first and an additional [[0]] on hit to the first target struck.

Hitting an enemy champion with an Attack or an Ability reduces this Ability's cooldown by 0.5 seconds. Critical Strikes reduce the cooldown by 1.5 seconds instead.

Zeri discharges a nova of electricity, dealing [[0]] to nearby enemies. If she hits an enemy champion, Zeri gains [[1]] and [[2]] for 5 seconds. Hitting an enemy champion with an Attack or an Ability extends this Ability's duration and adds a stack of Overcharge for 1.5 seconds. Critical Strikes add 2 additional stacks. Each stack grants 0.5% Move Speed.

During this time, Burst Fire becomes a faster triple shot that chains [[3]] to nearby enemies.

Change.After: Chain lightning magic damage can now critically strike

Change.Attribute: Full Charge Damage Based on Target's Max Health:

Change.After: Burst Fire's critical strikes now also multiply its base damage (in addition to its AD ratio)

Change.Attribute: Excess Attack Speed to AD Conversion:

Change.After: 1 second per champion hit with charged basic attacks or abilities
Q - Burst Fire now only applies on-hit effects once per cast
Zeri can now only gain one stack of R - Lightning Crash and one instance of E - Spark Surge cooldown reduction per Q - Burst Fire cast (excluding critical strikes)

Critical strikes on Q - Burst Fire grant Zeri an additional R - Lightning Crash stack and an additional instance of E - Spark Surge’s cooldown reduction (at most two procs per cast: one for Q upon hitting a champion and another if it crits on a champion)
If W - Ultrashock Laser hits a wall, it will now critically strike champions and monsters

Change.Attribute: Stacks per Champion hit by Lightning Crash:

Change.After: Right clicks executes enemies with health under 60-150 (levels 1-18)(+18% AP) (note: Damage to shields or invulnerabilities does not proc this execute)
Uncharged Zeri’s right click attack no longer does increased damage to enemies below a certain health threshold

Change.Before: 90-200 (based on level) (+90%AP) (+1-15% (based on level) target maximum HP)

Change.After: 10% Move Speed (Notethis should make the shield stack worse with other Move Speed sources)

Change.Attribute: Conversion of Excess Attack Speed to Bonus AD:

Change.After: For 5 seconds after using her E, Zeri gains Lightning Rounds and her Q - Burst Fire will deal additional magic damage to the first enemy hit

Change.Attribute: Bonus Magic Damage to First Target Hit with Lightning Rounds:
Change.After: 20/22/24/26/28 (+20% AP)(+12% bonus AD).This damage is increased by up to 65% based on Zeri's Critical Strike Chance.

Change.Attribute: Lightning Rounds Pierce Damage Falloff after First Target Hit:

Change.After: Zeri’s Overcharged attacks no longer deal 5/10/15(+15% AP) Bonus Magic Damage On-Hit

If Zeri’s R hits at least one enemy champion, Zeri gains 10% Move Speed, 30% Attack Speed, and chaining shots for 5 seconds. Hitting champions with Q or auto attacks refresh this buff by 1.5 seconds. (Notethis buff cannot be extended to be longer than its original duration.)
Hitting enemy champions grants Zeri 1 stack (3 stacks for critical strikes) of Overcharge for 1.5 seconds. Zeri gains 0.5% Move Speed for each stack of Overcharge, stacking infinitely.
